splash.headline: Connect with your community.
splash.tagline: A better way to find and post all LGBTQ events.

callouts.title:
Together we can
connect, build, and grow.
callouts.description: SeekOut is a website that helps bring the entire LGBTQ community together. From family events, fundraisers, sports, music, art and more — it's all here. Our goal is to provide more awareness and participation for all events.

callouts.title: Find, share, meet.
callouts.description: It’s all about you and what you want to do. Whether you’re a local or traveler, discover LGBTQ events that connect you with people who share your interests. All in one place.

list.title: EVENTS FOR EVERYONE
list.description: Find every type of LGBTQ event. Simply search by location, type, or date — anytime, anywhere!

list.title: TRUSTED SOURCE
list.description: Accurate, safe, and up-to-date. Posts come from community event organizers and are monitored.

list.title: SPREAD THE WORD
list.description: SeekOut makes it easy for you to quickly share events with your friends and community members.

callout.title: Post your event. It’s fast, easy, free!
callout.description:
Organizing a public LGBTQ event?
SeekOut allows you to quickly create and share your event with everyone.
We’re basically the online word-of-mouth for your event.

list.title: REACH THE RIGHT PEOPLE
list.description: Connect with more people who are interested in your event — not just a limited amount of followers.

list.title: SAVE TIME & MONEY
list.description: Start saving on printing, distribution, and advertising with limited reach. Put money saved towards your event.

list.title: GET THE WORD OUT NOW
list.description: Create, manage, and update your event in minutes. Simply do it on-the-go, from mobile or desktop.

testimonials.title: We’re making something great. Here’s why...

list.quoteContent: “When I travel to other cities, I have a hard time finding queer events that interest me. And when I search for stuff online, the information is usually out-of-date or not accurate.”
“As a promoter, I need to reach new people in order to keep my event going. It’s a challenge for me to find a broader audience outside of my regular crowd.”
“I wish I could find everything listed in one place. I often hear about events after they’ve happened and feel like I missed out.”
“The time and cost of promoting really adds up. My time is limited. I’d love to be able to post my event directly to the community within a matter of minutes.”
“I know there’s so much happening beyond nightlife, I just can’t seem to find it. It would be great to know about everything that’s going on in our community.”

callout.title: Made for the community by the community.
callout.description:
We’re currently building and will be launching soon in San Francisco!
Don’t worry — many other cities coming, too :)

callouts.title: Be a part of it.
callouts.description:
Get invited to receive early access and updates.
We’re all in this together. Let's connect, build, and grow our communities.

callouts.title: Thank you!
callouts.description:
Hang tight, we’ll be sure to notify you about early access and updates.
In the meantime, share SeekOut with your friends and community members.
